TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed FormsAuthenticationUser extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement
Public NotInheritable Class FormsAuthenticationUser Inherits ConfigurationElement

summary.span: 为使用基于窗体验证的 Web 应用程序配置用户凭据。

span.span: Configures the user's credentials for Web applications that use forms-based authentication.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类使您能够以编程方式访问和修改配置文件的一部分。The class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the section of a configuration file. 此类型是包含的组的一部分，则，和类型。This type is part of a group that includes the , the , and the types. 类型而不是集合类型直接影响基础配置标记。The types other than the collection type directly affect the underlying configuration tags. > [!NOTE] > 可将信息写入到配置文件在计算机、 站点或仅应用程序级别的相关部分。The can write information into the related section of the configuration file at machine, site, or application level only. 在层次结构中不同级别的配置文件中写入任何尝试都将导致由分析器生成的错误消息。Any attempt to write in a configuration file at a different level in the hierarchy will result in an error message generated by the parser. 但是，可以使用此类来读取层次结构中的任何级别的配置信息。However, you can use this class to read configuration information at any level in the hierarchy. 有关安全性和可伸缩性，建议使用外部存储库，例如数据库、 保留用户的凭据。For safety and scalability, it is recommended that you use an external repository, such as a database, to keep the users' credentials. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何获取访问现有 Web 应用程序的对象。The following code example shows how to obtain the to access the objects of an existing Web application. 配置文件将包含类似于下面的设置。The configuration file will contain a setup similar to the following. > [!NOTE] > 如果您使用[凭据进行身份验证 （ASP.NET 设置架构） 的窗体元素](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e5a001f8-fdbe-4c88-80ca-bfe36df23479)部分中，一定要遵循的指导原则，详见[ASP.NET 身份验证](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fc10b0ef-4ce4-4a7f-9174-886325221ee1)。If you use the [credentials Element for forms for authentication (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e5a001f8-fdbe-4c88-80ca-bfe36df23479) section, be sure to follow the guidelines explained at [ASP.NET Authentication](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fc10b0ef-4ce4-4a7f-9174-886325221ee1). 有关可伸缩性和更高的安全性，建议使用外部数据库来存储用户的凭据。For scalability and better security, it is recommended you use an external database to store the users' credentials. 有关构建安全的 ASP.NET 应用程序的详细信息，搜索 Microsoft MSDN 网站 (msdn.microsoft.com) 为"保护 ASP.NET 应用程序"和"构建安全的 ASP.NET 应用程序： 身份验证、 授权和安全通信。"For more information about building secure ASP.NET applications, search the Microsoft MSDN Web site (msdn.microsoft.com) for "Securing Your ASP.NET Application" and "Building Secure ASP.NET Applications: Authentication, Authorization, and Secure Communication." ``` defaultUrl="formsdefault.aspx" protection="Encryption" timeout="5" path="aspnet" slidingExpiration="false" cookieless="UseCookies" domain="domainName"> ``` [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationUser#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationUser/CS/formsauthenticationuser.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationUser#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationUser/VB/formsauthenticationuser.vb#1)]
